description:
After Oda Nobunaga`s assassination at the hands of Akechi Mitsuhide, Tokugawa Ieyasu found himself on the run in hostile category. Find out how he managed make the dangerous trek home through the land of Iga.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ieyasu wa Tenka Kuronin! Iga Koeru Hen
Ieyasu, Japan`s Great Struggler: The Crossing of Iga
家康は天下の苦労人! ~伊賀越え編~
